bottomText.description: Task status text displayed at bottom of progress animation.

busyImage.description: Overrides default image for busy progress animation.

failedStateText.description: Text displayed when the task fails.

lang.description: Specifies the language of attribute values.

log.description: Specifies size of log text area for determinate progress bar.

logMessage.description: Text message to display in log text area of determinate progress bar.

onClick.description: Mouse button is clicked on element.

onDblClick.description: Mouse button is double-clicked on element.

onKeyDown.description: Key is pressed down over element.

onKeyPress.description: Key is pressed and released over element.

onMouseDown.description: Mouse button is pressed over element.

onMouseOut.description: Mouse is moved away from element.

onMouseUp.description: Mouse button is released over element.

onMouseMove.description: Mouse is moved while over element.

overlayAnimation.description: If true, superimposes operation progress on animation.

percentChar.description: Character to represent percentage in progress.

progressImageUrl.description: Override default image for progress indicator.

progressControl.description: Add control button area to bottom or right.

refreshRate.description: Number milliseconds between updates to the progress.

status.description: Text to display indicating status of the operation.

taskState.description: String value representing current state of the operation.

title.description: Provides a title for main HTML element.

toolTip.description: Text displayed when mouse hovers over progress animation.

topText.description: Task description text displayed at top of progress animation.

type.description: Type of progress bar: DETERMINATE, INDETERMINATE, BUSY

width.description: Override width in pixels of progress animation.
